name: eoneopay/external
description: External libraries shared between Eoneo Pay applications

suggest.guzzlehttp/guzzle: Required to use the http client class
suggest.illuminate/http: Required to use the laravel request bridge
suggest.illuminate/validation: Required to use the validate subscriber and laravel validate bridge
suggest.laravel-doctrine/orm: Required to use the ORM class
suggest.monolog/monolog: Required to use the logger class
